TextView.android:text: Following the simple rules of the Hay Diet can reverse chronic and degenerative conditions such as constipation, indigestion and arthritis. It can be beneficial to asthma and allergy sufferers. It can also stimulate natural weight loss, thus reducing the health risks linked to obesity, such as diabetes, gallstones and coronary heart disease. Many people, including celebrities such as Sir John Mills and Princess Diana, have benefited from following the Hay Diet. Some people refer to the Hay Diet as food combining. There are rules that must be adhered to in order for the diet plan to be successful: eat only those food in one meal, which combines well.
